snippet: The ultrarunner Micah True, 58, was found in the mountainous Gila National Forest in New Mexico, with no obvious signs of injury, after his disappearance while on a 12-mile run.
abstract: Ultrarunner Micah True, missing for four days, is found dead with no obvious signs of injury in the mountainous Gila National Forest in New Mexico after his disappearance while on a 12-mile run.
lead_paragraph: The ultrarunner Micah True, 58, was found in the mountainous Gila National Forest in New Mexico, with no obvious signs of injury, after his disappearance while on a 12-mile run.

headline.seo: Ultramarathon Runner Micah True Found Dead in New Mexico
headline.main: Missing Ultramarathoner Found Dead in New Mexico
headline.print_headline: Missing Ultramarathoner Found Dead in New Mexico
